wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Lewis (born 22 June 1977) is an English semi-professional footballer from Chelmsford, Essex, who plays for Isthmian League Division One South club Croydon Athletic.

response: *Ben Lewis (Australian actor) (born 1979), English-born Australian musical theatre actor
*Ben Lewis (writer), British writer for theatre, radio and television; theatre director; actor and performer
*Ben Lewis (filmmaker), (born 1966) British filmmaker and art critic
*Ben Lewis (Canadian actor) (born 1985), Canadian film and television actor
